project.description: Define a new beanstalk container and create a job which will create and provision the beanstalk in the given Cage.

jp.ikedam.jenkins.plugins.extensible__ch.name: CustomerCage
jp.ikedam.jenkins.plugins.extensible__ch.description: In what cage do you want the container to be created?

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ContainerName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the new container

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo Provisioning "$ApplicationFlavor" beanstalk "$$ContainerName" in "$$CustomerCage" CUST="$$(echo "$$CustomerCage" | cut -d ':' -f 1)" CAGE="$$(echo "$$CustomerCage" | cut -d ':' -f 2)" ssh -F ~/.ssh/config ec2-user@nucleator << ENDSSH PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 nucleator beanstalk provision --customer "$$CUST" --cage "$$CAGE" --type "$ApplicationFlavor" --app_name "$$ContainerName" && nucleator beanstalk configure --customer "$$CUST" --cage "$$CAGE" --app_name "$$ContainerName" ENDSSH
